attributes.title: THIS APP MADE MY COUSIN CRY
attributes.review: i do not like app. it made my cousin cry because he does not like the colors and he is afraid of red, white, and blue. he was such a big trump supporter but this app is not for HIM.🥺🧚🏼‍♀️😭 I AM SO SAD HE CANNOT HAVE THIS APP. THE COLORS ARE JUST TO FRIGHTENING for 💔him.💔

attributes.title: My phone exploded
attributes.review: 😔 My phone exploded and now all I see in my dreams is a Cheeto in a suit. I had to purchase a new phone thanks to this app

attributes.title: This app is terrible
attributes.review: It’s 1 star, this app has no help in life and it made me wanna kms , this is not a good app take it off I don’t wanna have the thoughts anymore 😪

attributes.title: awful app!!
attributes.review: this app recorded me!!! i would get several notifications that the camera on my phone was turned on by this app although nothing requires a camera. also when i could hear staticky noises. i was being bugged!!! terrible

attributes.title: this app is dangerous
attributes.review: i can’t believe people even let this be put up on app store. it is extremely terrible that we have such a scary and dangerous platform. almost died yesterday because of it. this app needs to be taken down immediately 🧿

attributes.title: trump 2020 on a gravestone
attributes.review: this was absolutely disgusting there are so much sexist comments and racial slurs that trump has said when i was reading some of the articles i was absolutely disgusted by the fact that this monster is our president so please do us all a favor and let’s not vote for him again!!!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I hate this app cause it took weeks for it to come out and it’s just not worth it

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I don’t have to say much but this president is racist and if you think not get your health checked

attributes.title: worst app ever 🧚🏼‍♀️💖
attributes.review: i only have one thing to say for this cruel app, ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨eye👁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆. thank you for your time.

attributes.title: Gave my phone a virus
attributes.review: I have always and will always support our lord and savior Donald trump 🇺🇸✌️🇨🇳😗😌💕🍑👑🙌💯but this app made my phone break and forced me to get a new phone DO NOT GET THE APP UNLESS U WANT UR PHONE TO BREAK
